author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

Add a check on `src->size()` and skip running MVA inference if it's empty in BaseMVAValueMapProducer.

This should fix https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43863.

title: Check if src is empty before running inference in BaseMVAValueMapProducer
